scripts.test:stage:e2e: ENVIRONMENT=stage npx playwright test --project 'Google Chrome Custom'
scripts.test:headless:stage:sanity: ENVIRONMENT=stage npx playwright test --grep '@Sanity'  --project 'Google Chrome Custom'
scripts.test:headleass:stage:regression: ENVIRONMENT=stage npx playwright test --grep '@Regression'  --project 'Google Chrome Custom'
scripts.test:head:stage:sanity: HEADLESS=false ENVIRONMENT=stage npx playwright test --grep '@Sanity'  --project 'Google Chrome Custom'
scripts.test:head:stage:regression: HEADLESS=false ENVIRONMENT=stage npx playwright test --grep '@Regression'  --project 'Google Chrome Custom'
